page.title: 04TOURISM
page.content: VISITORS COME TO GLENRIDDING TO LOOK AT VIEWS AND TO HAVE A BIT OF PEACE AND QUIET . PEOPLE HAVE HOLIDAY HOMES HERE OR SOME PEOPLE COME FROM AS FAR AWAY AS ASIA AND SOME FROM NEWCASTLE. PEOPLE COME FROM YOUTH HOSTELS AND FROM SCHOOLS AND STAY AT GLENRIDDING YOUTH HOSTEL. ULLSWATER HOTEL IS A GOOD PLACE FOR CHILDREN BECAUSE THERE ARE TO PLAY ACTIVITIES. 1 OF THEM HAVE SWINGS AND SLIDES. THE OTHER ONE ONLY HAS A SLIDE. VISITORS COME TO DO ROCK CLIMBING OR WATER SPORTS. SOME PEOPLE COME TO GO ON THE STEAMERS . ONE OF THE MAIN ATTRACTIONS IN OUR AREA IS FELL WALKING ESPECIALLY AS HELVELLYN IS SO CLOSE BY .SOME PEOPLE COME TO GO HORSE RIDING AT SIDE FARM.
